Associated Students












 



Associated Students (AS) is the primary advocate for students at California State University, Northridge
            and provides excellent, meaningful programs and services designed to enhance and create a spirited
            learning-focused campus environment.




Student Leadership

Announcements 


Featured Events





AS Senate Meeting


Monday, May 1, 2023 - 9:00am to 11:00am 


 

Sit in on the weekly AS Senate Meeting. Or take the mic during open forum and address the senators with your concerns, questions and comments.To find out what's on the agenda, visit our agenda and minutes page. Read more 





Reuse Culture Expo


Monday, May 1, 2023 - 4:00pm to 6:00pm 


 

Reuse Culture Expo is an event hosted by AS sustainability as part of initiatives to cultivate a zero-waste and reuse lifestyle among CSUN students and staff. Read more 





Farmers Market: APIA History


Tuesday, May 2, 2023 - 10:00am to 2:00pm 


 

Come out and enjoy our annual AS Farmers Market. This week's celebration: APIA History Read more 





Fallen Matador Memorial


Wednesday, May 3, 2023 - 10:00am to 4:00pm 


 

Stop by & honor all those from the Matador Community we have lost. Roses will be provided while supplies last. Read more 





Outdoor Adventures: White Water Rafting


Friday, May 5, 2023 - 12:00am to Sunday, May 7, 2023 - 12:00pm 


 

Have you dreamt about soaring through rapids? Well, now it is your chance to be able to spend a day out White Water Rafting through beautiful rapids. Read more 





Outdoor Adventures: Intro to Surfing


Friday, May 5, 2023 - 12:00am to 12:00pm 


 

When in California, do as the... Californians do! It is a common myth that we surf to classes, so do your part in perpetuating awesome stereotypes and catch some swells out in the Pacific Ocean. Read more 





AS Senate Meeting


Monday, May 8, 2023 - 9:00am to 11:00am 


 

Sit in on the weekly AS Senate Meeting. Or take the mic during open forum and address the senators with your concerns, questions and comments.To find out what's on the agenda, visit our agenda and minutes page. Read more 





Trash Talkers


Monday, May 8, 2023 - 10:00am to 2:00pm 


 

Stop by our table during lunch to play some games, learn how to properly sort your waste and win some cool eco-friendly products. Read more 





Finals are a Drag


Monday, May 8, 2023 - 5:00pm to 7:00pm 


 

We know Finals are a drag, so why not take a break from studying and enjoy some DRAG BINGO! There will be snacks and test supplies available and chances to win some cool prizes! Read more 





Study & Snack with Senate


Wednesday, May 10, 2023 - 12:00pm to 2:00pm 


 

Stop by Matador Square for snacks, test supplies, and discover helpful tips from your Lower Division Senators for a successful finals week! Read more
